FuncDef:
The nat64 reverse-session-limit enable command enables the limitation on the number of reverse IP sessions that can be established in an NAT64 instance.
The undo nat64 reverse-session-limit enable command disables a NAT device from limiting the number of reverse IP sessions that can be established in an NAT64 instance.
By default, the NAT64 session number limit function is enabled.
ExtraInfo: The configured maximum number of reverse IP sessions that can be established can take effect only after the nat64 reverse-session-limit enable command is run.
